function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of convergence between health and built environment sectors","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and poor health outcomes for city residents","Mitigation":"Establishing collaboration and communication channels between health and built environment professionals","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, communication tools, data sharing technologies","People":"City residents, health professionals, built environment professionals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of long-term financial sustainability for malaria prevention efforts","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining progress and sustaining positive outcomes in malaria prevention","Mitigation":"Developing financial models for long-term funding, seeking public-private partnerships, exploring innovative funding sources","Technologies":"Financial modeling tools, fundraising platforms, impact investment strategies","People":"Global health organizations, private investors, government agencies","Owner":"Global health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Quality-related concerns over drug efficacy, safety, and surveillance for malaria prevention","Impact":"Risk of ineffective treatment, medication-related risks, and surveillance gaps in malaria prevention","Mitigation":"Improving drug testing and surveillance protocols, enhancing safety regulations, investing in advanced surveillance technologies","Technologies":"Drug testing equipment, surveillance technologies, safety monitoring tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, regulatory agencies"}]}
